casebody.data:
Gebell et al., Appellants, v. Ebersold, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as Gebell v. Ebersold (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 53.]

(No. 87-1522 Submitted June 1, 1988 Decided July 20, 1988.) Keating, Ritchie, Lyon & Norwine Co., L.P.A., Michael F. Lyon, Kevin L. Swick, Harriss & Katz Co., L.P.A., John L. Berg and Richard L. Katz, for appellants. Kohnen, Patton & Hunt, Ann Ruley Combs, Short, Routt, Weber & Davis, D. Marc Routt and Sherry L. Davis, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of Hardy v. VerMeulen (1987), 32 Ohio St. 3d 45, 512 N.E. 2d 626.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
